title: Procelain Skin Whitening Serum Hydroquinone Kojic Acid Glycolic Acid Vitamin C Licorice Mulberry Extract for Melasma, Hyperpigmentation 2oz
description: Porcelain Skin Whitening Serum is professionally formulated to visibly fade/remove age spots/brown spots, freckles, sun spots, acne scars, Uneven skin tone. Our product is based on multiple effective ingredients that provide synergetic effects, exfoliate and penetrate skin more effectively than hydroquinone alone.The benefits of the serum:- Fade/Remove Age Spots/Brown Spots, Freckles, sun spots, Acne Scars,uneven skin tone- Prevent future skin dark spots production- Reduce skin damage from sun exposure- Botanical extracts provide a rich source of antioxidants and vitamins- Improvement to skin tone and texture- Suitable for all skin types, whole face skinThe unique features:- Unique combination of multiple ingredients clinically proven to effectively treat the symptoms of melasma.- Hydroquinone is FDA approved and well-researched ingredient, incredibly effective for its intended purpose. No other skin lightening ingredient compares to its effectiveness.- Kojic acid has been proven by many researches to be effective for inhibiting melanin production.-Glycolic acid is believed that its benefit is in helping cell turnover rates and removing unhealthy or abnormal layers of superficial skin cells where hyperpigmented cells can accumulate.-Licorice root extracts has proven to be effective in anti-aging, rosacea, pigmented, sensitive and acne prone skin.- And much, much more...Is Hydroquione safe?Interestingly, hydroquinone happens to be a potent antioxidant and there is even research showing that workers who handle pure hydroquinone actually have lower incidences of cancer than the population as a whole.Our product is manufactured with highest quality and fresh to ensure the best results.

title: Watts Beauty 2% Retinol - Vitamin A / Hyaluronic Acid Antioxidant Moisturizer Cream- Proudly Made in the USA - 97% Natural / 71% Organic - 2oz
description: A powerful cocktail of antioxidants combine with Vitamin A may help to diminish fine lines, wrinkles, and premature aging due to sun exposure. Vitamin A boasts a long list of clinically proven restorative, anti-aging properties. This result oriented formulation may help fight free radical damage as well as restore and renew firmness, elasticity, and thickness to the skin.

title: e.l.f. Studio Baked Highlighter 83704 Moonlight Pearls
description: Create a radiant glow with this illuminating powder that highlights the skin with a sheer wash of shimmering color. Infused with Vitamin E, Jojoba, Sunflower, Apricot and Grape to nourish and hydrate the skin. The long-lasting baked shimmering color can be applied wet for a vibrant effect or dry for sheer pigmentation.

title: Hard Candy Lash Ink 4 Day Lash Stain
description: The Hard Candy Lash Ink 4-Day Lash Stain cloaks your eyelashes keeping them thick and fluttery up to four days straight. By using this eyelash stain you need not reapply mascara for up to four days. No matter whether you bathe, swim, cry, or get wet in the rain, your lashes will stay flawless. This Hard Candy lash stain comes with a bristle brush that allows you to apply the lash ink to your lashes from the roots to the tips. You can have thick glossy lashes every day, with just a little work every four days using this 4-day lash stain
